docs.title: 1. About Scribe
docs.text:
The free version of Scribe allows you to continue sharing your generated content for free. The paid version allows you to download material.

  • Option 1: Scribe allows us to use its results in an embedded format.

  • Option 2: A Chrome plugin link helps us download a complete HTML from Scribe.

docs.title: 2. About What to click
docs.text:
This is a free script link that runs on Firefox and generates PDF, HTML, and Markdown, but it looks more rustic.

  • Option 3: with Markdown doesn't look good.

  • Option 4: PDF, hosted in the same repository.

  • Option 5: Looks good.

  • Option 6: PDF, hosted publicly on Google Drive.

docs.title: What to click:
docs.text:
1. Visit https://www.wikipedia.org/.

  2. Click "" input field.

  3. Click "Search" .

  4. Click "Terra Australis" link.

  5. Click "Jodocus Hondius" link.

  6. Click "Gerard Mercator" link.

  7. Click "matemático" link.

  8. Click "Acceder" .

  9. Click "" input field.

  10. Click "Mantener mi sesión iniciada" .

  11. Click "Acceder" button.

  12. Click "¿Has olvidado tu contraseña?" link.

  13. Click "" input field.

  14. Click "Restablecer la contraseña" .
